pages.text: $(li)Snow Leopars are big felines that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_mountains)Snowy Mountains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundras$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_mountains)Snowy Taiga$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga_mountains)Taiga Mountains$(/l).$(br)$(li)They are not aggresive towards humans, instead, they will hunt other animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/sheep)Sheeps$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horses$(/l).
$(li)They can't be tamed but they still can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/moose_ribs)Raw Moose Ribs$(/l)
